Name: John the Ripper
Description: John the Ripper is a fast password cracker, currently available for many flavors of Unix, Windows, DOS, BeOS, and OpenVMS.
HTU: Install John the Ripper, run `john <password-file>` to start cracking passwords.

Name: Hashcat
Description: Hashcat is the world's fastest and most advanced password recovery utility, supporting various algorithms and attack modes.
HTU: Install Hashcat, use appropriate commands to crack hashes, e.g., `hashcat -m 0 -a 0 example.hash example.dict`.

Name: Hydra
Description: Hydra is a very fast network logon cracker that supports numerous protocols and services to perform brute-force attacks.
HTU: Install Hydra, configure the target and protocol, run the attack, e.g., `hydra -l user -P passlist.txt ftp://target`.

Name: Medusa
Description: Medusa is a speedy, massively parallel, modular, login brute-forcer that supports various protocols.
HTU: Install Medusa, configure the target and protocol, run the brute-force attack, e.g., `medusa -h target -u user -P passlist -M ssh`.

Name: CrackStation
Description: CrackStation is an online password cracking tool that uses a massive database of password hashes to crack passwords.
HTU: Visit CrackStation's website, enter the hash, and start the cracking process.
